name: KEARNEY REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER
sampleDescriptions: Kearney Regional Medical Center is changing ownership, and it is anticipated that certain issues with the federal government will need to be navigated in order to complete the sale.

Kearney Regional Medical Center is changing ownership, and it is anticipated that certain issues with the federal government will need to be navigated in order to complete the sale.
Worked with the Senate and the Federal Trade Commission to ensure that the sale of Kearney Regional Medical Center to Bryan Health did not run afoul of any FTC-related antitrust concerns.
